title: INDIE Live Expo Winter 2024 is Coming, Award Nominees and Stream Time Revealed
description: Here’s some news from the Indie Live Expo (who we are media partners with). The INDIE Live Expo has revealed its line-up of for its Winter 2024 show, which will take place... The post INDIE Live Expo Winter 2024 is Coming, Award Nominees and Stream Time Revealed appeared first on Indie Games Plus.
author: Dann Sullivan
excerpt: The INDIE Live Expo has revealed its line-up of for its Winter 2024 show and the nominees for its 2024 awards.
text: Here’s some news from the Indie Live Expo (who we are media partners with). The INDIE Live Expo has revealed its line-up of for its Winter 2024 show, which will take place on 7th of December (from 7PM JST / 2AM PST / 5AM EST / 11AM CET). The line-up includes over 100 games ranging from familiar, established indie games like Balatro through to world premieres of new titles such as Sofia in Exchange for Lies. According to the press release, this year’s lineup includes “All in Abyss: Judge the Fake, BLADE CHIMERA, Kemono Teatime, Marisa of Liartop Mountain, NOROI KAGO: the Grudged Domain, The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily, Yunyun Syndrome!? Rhythm Psychosis” as well as multiple world premieres. “INDIE Live Expo 2024.12.7” features three segments, each about an hour long. The first segment, Indie Waves, brings high energy with 15-second videos of indie games from around the world on PC, console, and mobile, all in quick succession.” Some of the candidates for the Indie Live Expo Awards. The event will close out with the Indie Live Expo Awards 2024, which will feature four different categories (Best Game Feel, Best New Characters, Rules of Play and Best Short Game) and the reveal of their winners. You can find the nominees below: You’ll be able to tune in to it streaming live, in English, on Twitch, YouTube, X / Twitter, and Steam. About The Author Dann Sullivan After almost a decade of selling games, Dann decided to try his hand at writing about them instead. A few years in and he is the Founder and Editor-in-Chief of Big Boss Battle, where he and his team cover games of all shapes and sizes. When not in the role, he can often be found seeking out small, memorable game experiences.
html:
Here’s some news from the Indie Live Expo (who we are media partners with).

The INDIE Live Expo has revealed its line-up of for its Winter 2024 show, which will take place on 7th of December (from 7PM JST / 2AM PST / 5AM EST / 11AM CET). The line-up includes over 100 games ranging from familiar, established indie games like Balatro through to world premieres of new titles such as Sofia in Exchange for Lies.

According to the press release, this year’s lineup includes “All in Abyss: Judge the Fake, BLADE CHIMERA, Kemono Teatime, Marisa of Liartop Mountain, NOROI KAGO: the Grudged Domain, The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily, Yunyun Syndrome!? Rhythm Psychosis” as well as multiple world premieres.

“INDIE Live Expo 2024.12.7” features three segments, each about an hour long. The first segment, Indie Waves, brings high energy with 15-second videos of indie games from around the world on PC, console, and mobile, all in quick succession.”

The event will close out with the Indie Live Expo Awards 2024, which will feature four different categories (Best Game Feel, Best New Characters, Rules of Play and Best Short Game) and the reveal of their winners. You can find the nominees below:

You’ll be able to tune in to it streaming live, in English, on Twitch, YouTube, X / Twitter, and Steam.

About The Author

Dann Sullivan

After almost a decade of selling games, Dann decided to try his hand at writing about them instead. A few years in and he is the Founder and Editor-in-Chief of Big Boss Battle, where he and his team cover games of all shapes and sizes. When not in the role, he can often be found seeking out small, memorable game experiences.
